mapper.select: SELECT p.portfolio_id, p.member_id, p.stock_code, p.quantity, p.avg_price, p.created_at, p.updated_at, s.stock_name, s.current_price FROM portfolio p LEFT JOIN stock s ON p.stock_code = s.stock_code WHERE p.member_id = #{memberId} ORDER BY p.created_at DESC

SELECT p.portfolio_id, p.member_id, p.stock_code, p.quantity, p.avg_price, p.created_at, p.updated_at, s.stock_name, s.current_price FROM portfolio p LEFT JOIN stock s ON p.stock_code = s.stock_code WHERE p.member_id = #{memberId} AND p.stock_code = #{stockCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO portfolio ( member_id, stock_code, quantity, avg_price, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{memberId}, #{stockCode}, #{quantity}, #{avgPrice}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT COALESCE(SUM(p.quantity * s.current_price), 0) AS total_value FROM portfolio p JOIN stock s ON p.stock_code = s.stock_code WHERE p.member_id = #{memberId}
